lead_paragraph: IMAMURA--Reginald (Reggie) H.,50, of Larchmont, NY, passed away on Monday, February 29, 2016. He is survived by his loving wife of 27 years, Lisa, daughters Natalie and Sophie, mother Kikuko, brother Anthony, and brother-in-law Bryan Slater. Reggie was predeceased by his father, Hideki Imamura. Reggie was employed in the financial services and banking industry, most recently with PNC Financial. A Celebration of Life memorial service will be held Saturday, March 5, 2016, 10:30am at St. John's Episcopal Church, 4 Fountain Square, Larchmont, NY. A reception will take place immediately following the service at the Larchmont Yacht Club, 1 Woodbine Ave. In lieu of flowers, please make donations to the Pancreatic Cancer Foundation at pancan.org. Full details and additional information can be found at JJFFH.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  IMAMURA, REGINALD (REGGIE) H.
